Package com.hexanome16.client.requests.backend.prompts

Class PromptsRequests

java.lang.Object
com.hexanome16.client.requests.backend.prompts.PromptsRequests
public class PromptsRequests extends Object
Class responsible for sending HTTP requests related to the prompts.

    • buyCard

      public static void buyCard(long sessionId, String cardMd5, String authToken, PurchaseMap proposedDeal)
      Sends a request to the server to buy a card.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - id of the game request is sent from.
      cardMd5 - Hash value of the card we're sending.
      authToken - username of player trying to buy card.
      proposedDeal - deal proposed by the player.

    • getPlayerBank

      public static String getPlayerBank(long sessionId, String username)
      Gets player bank of player with username "username" in session with session id "sessionId".
      Parameters:
      sessionId - Session ID.
      username - username of player.
      Returns:
      PurchaseMap representation of the player's funds as a String

    • getGameBankInfo

      public static String getGameBankInfo(long sessionId)
      Retrieves the game bank info after the purchase is done. (or attempted)
      Parameters:
      sessionId - Session ID of the game whose bank we want to retrieve.
      Returns:
      PurchaseMap representation of the Bank's funds as a String
